title: Finding Him: Romance Novella Box Set
description: Bestselling author Kathleen Lee brings you her three sweet & sexy gay romance novellas all in one set, including: MALE SEEKING MALE: He was just looking for experience. What he got was an unexpected romance. THE TROUBLE WITH TROUBLE: When trouble strolls in, common sense walks out. STRIPPING THE PAIN: Finding happiness is just as easy--and difficult--as letting go.
author: Kathleen   Lee
